_source.content: @Commander_DC I used to read Eric Von Daniken books as a kid so yeah Ive always been fascinated by the prospect of `aliens from outer space".But now that Im older and a flat earther 😜 Im more inclined to believe that there are other life forms that exist, just that they exist below us, to the side of us and amongst us...its all in the word extra terrestrial (terrestrial - on or relating to the Earth, inhabitant of the Earth)

group.description:
Welcome ! I set this group up in January 2021.

Battling the Socialists 24/7 as well as those in positions of power and influence who abuse their privilege. Not into globalism and an anything goes society. 

We'll call anybody out if they step out of line.

We aim to keep standards high so there’s a few rules for this group…

No racism and no inciting violence. This is not Facebook, Twitter or Tik Tok so we aim to try and keep standards high. 

Please join the "New Zealand Politics" group and post this link wherever you go.

https://gab.com/groups/9425
group.title: New Zealand Politics

card.title: The Trilateral Commission

_source.content: The Trilateral Commission:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=peIQ5Zasm_k  The Trilateral Commission was founded by David Rockefeller and Zbigniew Brzezinski in July 1973 and is composed of approximately 325 elites in business, banking, and politics. The Trilateral Commission is propagated as being an economic cooperation between America, Europe, and Japan, but in reality is another secretive society/organization – this one specializing in creating the trilateral economic interdependence necessary to bring in the New World Order system of world currency and world governance. They are setting up the framework and power structure necessary for these multinational banks and corporations to assume total control, dominating the world’s populations, governments, and economies.The following presentation "The Trilateral Commission" was taken from a chapter in my book "The Atlantean Conspiracy" available here:  http://www.lulu.com/spotlight/ericdubayGet Connected With Me:Website: http://www.EricDubay.comBlog: http://www.AtlanteanConspiracy.comForum: http://www.IFERS.123.stBooks: http://www.lulu.com/spotlight/ericdubayFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/edfes/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ericdubaz/Twitter: https://twitter.com/ericdubayGettr: https://gettr.com/user/eric_dubaySoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/eric-dubay/Mewe: https://mewe.com/i/ericdubayMinds: https://www.minds.com/EricDubayGab: https://gab.ai/Eric-DubayGoodreads: https://www.goodreads.com/ericdubayYouTube: http://www.youtube.com/c/flatearthericOdysee: https://odysee.com/@EricDubay:cBitChute: https://www.bitchute.com/channel/TCgwKoAf3Y9z/Real Truthseekers: https://real-truth-seekers.com/@ericdubayRokfin: https://rokfin.com/EricDubayRumble: https://rumble.com/c/c-1286253Dollar Vigilante: https://dollarvigilante.tv/c/eric.dubay/videosTelegram: http://t.me/flatearthericdubayEmail: ericdubaynewsletter@protonmail.com

_source.content: When it comes to the so called "January 6th insurrection" the US Department of Justice has charged over 400 people with participating in the events of that day. However, the treatment of those prisoners since their arrest has brought up serious concerns about the prisoner system’s abuse of the rights of those arrested. The most egregious example of this abuse has been the extensive use of solitary confinement against those arrested and charged with taking part in the insurrection. This abuse has been documented in several high profile cases, such as that of US Army Reservist and West Point graduate Lt. Emily Rainey, who was placed in solitary confinement for over a week with no explanation and no access to legal counsel. This type of treatment is particularly concerning given that solitary confinement is known to cause long-term psychological and physical harm, even in cases of short-term confinement.In addition to the use of solitary confinement, those arrested have faced a pattern of other abuses, including a lack of access to legal counsel and inadequate medical care. These abuses have been particularly evident in the case of Eric Munchel, who was denied access to his attorney for six days after his arrest. Similarly, several inmates have reported being denied medical care for serious ailments, such as one inmate who was denied treatment for a fractured leg, and another who was denied medications for a heart condition. The abuses faced by those arrested on January 6th are a grave injustice, and a violation of their human rights. It is especially concerning that these abuses have been perpetrated by the US prison system, an entity that is supposed to uphold the law and protect the rights of those in its care. It is therefore imperative that steps be taken to ensure that these abuses are not repeated, and that those responsible be held accountable.References1. Shear, M.D., & Dawsey, J. (2021, February 10). West Point graduate faces court-martial after Capitol riots arrest. The Washington Post. https://www.washingtonpost.com/defense-environment/2021/02/10/west-point-graduate-court-martial-capitol-riots-arrest/2. Smith, M. (2020, November 9). The effects of solitary confinement on mental health. Verywell Mind. https://www.verywellmind.com/the-effects-of-solitary-confinement-on-mental-health-47758093. Hammond, S. (2021, February 1). Capitol rioter denied access to lawyer for six days. The Washington Post. https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2021/02/01/eric-munchel-capitol-rioter-lawyer/4. Peralta, E. (2021, February 12). Inmates at D.C. jail say they’re denied medical care for ailments. NPR. https://www.npr.org/2021/02/12/965875913/inmates-at-d-c-jail-say-theyre-denied-medical-care-for-ailments
_source.contentraw:
When it comes to the so called "January 6th insurrection" the US Department of Justice has charged over 400 people with participating in the events of that day. However, the treatment of those prisoners since their arrest has brought up serious concerns about the prisoner system’s abuse of the rights of those arrested. The most egregious example of this abuse has been the extensive use of solitary confinement against those arrested and charged with taking part in the insurrection. This abuse has been documented in several high profile cases, such as that of US Army Reservist and West Point graduate Lt. Emily Rainey, who was placed in solitary confinement for over a week with no explanation and no access to legal counsel. This type of treatment is particularly concerning given that solitary confinement is known to cause long-term psychological and physical harm, even in cases of short-term confinement.

In addition to the use of solitary confinement, those arrested have faced a pattern of other abuses, including a lack of access to legal counsel and inadequate medical care. These abuses have been particularly evident in the case of Eric Munchel, who was denied access to his attorney for six days after his arrest. Similarly, several inmates have reported being denied medical care for serious ailments, such as one inmate who was denied treatment for a fractured leg, and another who was denied medications for a heart condition.

The abuses faced by those arrested on January 6th are a grave injustice, and a violation of their human rights. It is especially concerning that these abuses have been perpetrated by the US prison system, an entity that is supposed to uphold the law and protect the rights of those in its care. It is therefore imperative that steps be taken to ensure that these abuses are not repeated, and that those responsible be held accountable.

References

1. Shear, M.D., & Dawsey, J. (2021, February 10). West Point graduate faces court-martial after Capitol riots arrest. The Washington Post. https://www.washingtonpost.com/defense-environment/2021/02/10/west-point-graduate-court-martial-capitol-riots-arrest/

2. Smith, M. (2020, November 9). The effects of solitary confinement on mental health. Verywell Mind. https://www.verywellmind.com/the-effects-of-solitary-confinement-on-mental-health-4775809

3. Hammond, S. (2021, February 1). Capitol rioter denied access to lawyer for six days. The Washington Post. https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2021/02/01/eric-munchel-capitol-rioter-lawyer/

4. Peralta, E. (2021, February 12). Inmates at D.C. jail say they’re denied medical care for ailments. NPR. https://www.npr.org/2021/02/12/965875913/inmates-at-d-c-jail-say-theyre-denied-medical-care-for-ailments

_source.content: Good morning❗ ☕🇺🇸 ✝️ 📜🌄 Daily Bible verseFor I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope. Jeremiah 29:11🌄🙏 Morning prayerLord, help our finite human mind always remember to include You and Your involvement in every plan we make. *🙏 In Jesus' name we pray. Amen.🌄 Finding the right person to share your life is a most serious undertaking to be approached with total honesty.Let's all make the day count.* *Charlie Daniels📣 It's Monday, February 13, 2023, and the Obama/Biden administration was/(is) the most corrupt in US history. #Obamagate.- Dan Bongino⏱💣 2 Years and 24 days of a "hostage situation." - Juanita Broaddrick🇺🇸🖋️Biden Executive actions: 685 as of February 9, 2023, including 106 executive orders, 125 presidential memoranda, 381 proclamations, and 73 notices. (Ballotpedia)The Biden Recession: The Dow is down. Unemployment rate is 3.4%. Inflation is 6.5%. 💥 Gas is $3.42/gallon. (AAA)  RCP averages: Joe's job approval rating spread is -7.2%. His job approval avg.: 44.3%.👎 Where is the blowback from the newly "discovered" classified documents?IBD/TIPP has Joe at +2, in case you're wondering how this "average" became so skewed.🙄Build The WallTX takes over building the border wall, starting with 7 miles near Del Rio.Gov. Abbott creates Texas border czar position and hires Mike Banks, a recently retired border patrol agent, to fill it.Biden should be impeached for failing to protect the border and U.S citizens.On CovidNancy Mace, R-SC, raked former Twitter exec Vijaya Gaddi over the coals, demanding to know what right she had to silence medical doctors from their medical opinions about Covid, and mentioned natural immunity.  She expressed s t r o n g  regret about getting the vax, because she now has health issues she fears will never go away.The Washington Post (gasp) reported that 58% of coronavirus deaths in August, 2022, were people who were vaccinated or boosted.  More sudden deaths. US jets have now shot down 4 objects traversing our airspace in the past 8 days. Unprecedented. Good morning❗ ☕🇺🇸

✝️ 📜🌄 Daily Bible verse
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
Jeremiah 29:11

🌄🙏 Morning prayer
Lord, help our finite human mind always remember to include You and Your involvement in every plan we make. *
🙏 In Jesus' name we pray. Amen.

🌄 Finding the right person to share your life is a most serious undertaking to be approached with total honesty.
Let's all make the day count.*

*Charlie Daniels

📣 It's Monday, February 13, 2023, and the Obama/Biden administration was/(is) the most corrupt in US history. #Obamagate.
- Dan Bongino

⏱💣 2 Years and 24 days of a "hostage situation." - Juanita Broaddrick

🇺🇸🖋️Biden Executive actions: 685 as of February 9, 2023, including 106 executive orders, 125 presidential memoranda, 381 proclamations, and 73 notices. (Ballotpedia)
The Biden Recession: The Dow is down. Unemployment rate is 3.4%. Inflation is 6.5%. 💥

Gas is $3.42/gallon. (AAA)

RCP averages: Joe's job approval rating spread is -7.2%.
His job approval avg.: 44.3%.👎 Where is the blowback from the newly "discovered" classified documents?
IBD/TIPP has Joe at +2, in case you're wondering how this "average" became so skewed.🙄

Build The Wall
TX takes over building the border wall, starting with 7 miles near Del Rio.
Gov. Abbott creates Texas border czar position and hires Mike Banks, a recently retired border patrol agent, to fill it.
Biden should be impeached for failing to protect the border and U.S citizens.

On Covid
Nancy Mace, R-SC, raked former Twitter exec Vijaya Gaddi over the coals, demanding to know what right she had to silence medical doctors from their medical opinions about Covid, and mentioned natural immunity. She expressed s t r o n g regret about getting the vax, because she now has health issues she fears will never go away.
The Washington Post (gasp) reported that 58% of coronavirus deaths in August, 2022, were people who were vaccinated or boosted. More sudden deaths. Anti Covid vaxxers and vaccine-injured protest outside the BBC in London.

Law and Order
November 19, 2022, Judge Loretta Preska ordered dozens of documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's associates to be unsealed, according to Daily Mail.
Since then, crickets.🦗

Current events
Congrats to the Kansas City Chiefs on winning Superbowl LVII.
US jets have now shot down 4 objects traversing our airspace in the past 8 days. Unprecedented.
Senator John Fetterman (stroke survivor) (D) PA was rushed to a DC hospital Thursday.
House Republicans just blocked a law that would have allowed illegal immigrants to vote in Washington, DC.👍
The Big Guy gave the State of the Union address, not even or barely mentioning the Chinese spy balloon, inflation, the border, Afghanistan, constitutional rights. Sarah Huckabee Sanders gave a brilliant, brief, Republican rebuttal.
House Republicans just blocked a law that would have allowed illegal immigrants to vote in Washington, DC. 👍
Kevin McCarthy 👢ed Adam Schiff and Eric Swalwell from the Intelligence committee. 218 Republican representatives voted Ilhan Omar off the Foreign Affairs committee after years of her making anti-Semitic comments.
The Daily Mail reported that there has been a DNA match to prove that Ilhan married her brother to break immigration laws. And they now confirm that Omar reported years ago to friends she had indeed married her brother. Prosecute her. She does not even belong in Congress.
Federal prosecutors imposed new conditions of Sam Bankman-Fried's release, not allowing him to contact current or former employees of FTX or Alameda.
More Twitter Files drop. Before Elon Musk steps aside as Chief Twit, I would like to propose that he return all Trump Supporters' suspended accounts. Otherwise, Twitter will n e v e r again be a public forum.
Joe Biden and the BLS LIED about creating a million jobs March-June 2022, setting the stage for 7 interest rate hikes last year. Turns out only 10,500 jobs were created.😠
Nancy Pelosi and J6 committee tried to hide evidence for 30-50 years in the National Archives.🔍 New House Rules may make evidence available now. 🤞 Justice for J6 prisoners!
Another 1.75 trillion dollars swooshed out of D.C. in the dem's latest Green New Deal, assisted by RINOS.
Joe's 106 E.O.s have cost taxpayers upwards of 1.5 trillion dollars❗

⛴️ ⛓️
Food shortages and supply chain issues abound, not to mention airlines are in free fall, and the FAA. Fire incompetent Mayor Pete❗

SCOTUS
Chief Justice Roberts says probe failed to identify SCOTUS leaker 👎 UNACCEPTABLE ❗

Almost 100 billion US dollars have been sent to Ukraine.💸

POTUS 45

Free speech ❗
